posts.post_content:
Offered here is a T200 Washington AL Fatima Team Card. If has excellent clarity and resolution and looks good. It does have a crease that runs down between McBride and Engle that lessens in severity as it travels down to the bottom of the card. A second crease is apparent mostly when turning the card at an angle running through Henry to the bottom as well. The back looks good with 
SOLD
